text: Tonight We Sing is a 1953 American biographical musical movie directed by Mitchell Leisen and based on the 1946 novel Impresario. It stars David Wayne, Ezio Pinza, Roberta Peters, Anne Bancroft, Tamara Toumanova and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1950s biographical movies Category:1953 musical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Mitchell Leisen
title: Tonight We Sing
